section.title: Extract method
section.para:
A useful refactoring is to mark code and create a method from the selected code. To use this in this exercise, mark the coding of the "for" loop, right click on the selection and select
Refactoring Extract Method
. Use calculateSum as the name of the new method.
After this refactoring the class should look like the following code.

section.title: Extract Constant
section.para:
You can also extract strings and create constants based on the strings. Mark for this example the "Hello Eclipse!" string in your source code, right-click on it and select
Refactor Extract Constant
. Name your new constant HELLO.
The string is now defined as a constant.
